review: Well this chromecast seems pretty cool and worked okay for about two days. Streaming my gs5 to it has proven more than a pain. It frequently disconnects or stops to load. I have to set it up over and over, and it will only work for a couple minutes at a time. Of course you can't call Google for tech support so I'm throwing my chromecast in the garbage. It's pretty unusably bad to be honest.

review: better than expected. i googled to find out how i could see my desktop on my tv and google chromecast was mentioned over and over again.  keep in mind you must have an android smart phone or i phone as this is wi-fi based.  it is easy to download the drivers and you will be 'casting' within minutes.  you can show your desk top or internet content, including streaming on your tv.
